CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: M yawns; C playing with something
M moves dishes and picks up tray
M picks up a lid and puts it on pot
M picks up a cup; C picks up a saucer
M picks up a different saucer For C; drops it
M picks up small covered container
M takes lid off and replaces it
M arranges dishes as she speaks
C takes lid of container on and off
C puts utensil in house and out
M puts coffee in C's cup and then her own; C plays with sugar container
M pours cream with small pitcher in C's cup and hers
C spoons sugar into M's cup; stirs
M does not drink; holds head in her hands
M does not give C time to answer these questions
M turns to opposite page; C opens another book
M helps C not to fall out of his chair
M helps C back in his chair
M stands chair upright and holds for C
C looks like he might get another book
C points to cover of nursery ryhme book
M points as she names objects
M points as she names pieces of clothing and parts of body
